title: Jhund
description: Jhund is a sports drama film directed by Nagraj Manjule. It stars Amitabh Bachchan in the lead role of a retired sports teacher who starts a slum soccer team.

title: Gone Girl
description: Gone Girl is a psychological thriller film directed by David Fincher. It stars Ben Affleck and Rosamund Pike.

title: Kahaani
description: Kahaani is a Bollywood mystery thriller film directed by Sujoy Ghosh. It stars Vidya Balan as a pregnant woman searching for her missing husband.

title: Se7en
description: Se7en is a psychological thriller film directed by David Fincher. It stars Brad Pitt and Morgan Freeman as detectives hunting a serial killer.

title: Talaash
description: Talaash is a Bollywood psychological thriller film directed by Reema Kagti. It stars Aamir Khan, Kareena Kapoor Khan, and Rani Mukerji.

title: Prisoners
description: Prisoners is a psychological thriller film directed by Denis Villeneuve. It stars Hugh Jackman and Jake Gyllenhaal.
